name: secret de femme
text: I really enjoyed the pizza it was delicious, the service was great. The girl who took care of us was very nice and welcoming. I recommend 100%

name: Jamil Abbasy
text: This is literally the ONLY place in Natick that has good pizza and we have lived here for 8 years!  Every time we have ordered from here since it first opened, it has been a good experience.  The staff is always friendly too.  Thank you for coming to Natick.  You will not be disappointed by this place!

name: Eleanor Johnson
text: Went here with some ladies from my group home. They are strong lovely women with disabilities. The staff was so kind and helpful. The manager Brian Z. went above and beyond for us and we are so grateful! Great food and even greater service. Thank you Anthony's staff! We will be back with friends!

name: Kelly Angelo
text: Excellent service, food is fresh and very very good. Prices however a bit on the high side, I don't think it is really necessary to charge $3.00 for a child size milk or lemonade. Otherwise than that I thought it was great.

name: Will Jaynes
text: Great new place for lunch or dinner! Clean and classy decor and the staff makes you feel right at home. Philly Steak n' Cheese pizza is my favorite here. Everyone definitely has to try their wings as well. I will definitely be back, and would suggest this place to all family and friends.

name: Saajan Patel
text: Great and fast service. The pizza can use a bit more flavor (I give it a 6/10) and the quantity for the eggplant (i give it a 7.5 / 10)  can be a bit more. Other than that, pretty solid place.

name: Phil Hemminger
text: One of my favorite dining experiences of the year!  In the area for medical reasons and searched for brick oven pizza.  Liked the previous reviews and drove 20 miles or so to try it.  The service and the staff were superb!  They knew we …More

name: James Williams
text: I celebrated my graduation today in this delicious restaurant. happy to tell that it was a wonderful evening and the venue was certainly the reason for this outstanding evening. The crew  contributed in a pleasant way, the cuisine was …More

name: Cindy Moss
text:
Food is great.
Attphere is great.
Service are really great too.

name: Laurie Alford
text: Got Philly cheesesteak pizza, generous toppings, but meat was too salty and crust wasn't crispy and the large pizza was $24 So pricey!

name: Mari Morse
text: Rating as a four star and not 5 to be fair since I didn't get to go in bc of the virus scare. This pizza is really one of the best. The crust is light and thoroughly baked through, I like the taste of the sauce and cheese. I dont know how …More

name: kevin coughlin
text: We stopped in Tuesday night.  Plenty of seating available.  We ordered a cauliflower pizza and another with hot sausage,  hot peppers and pepperoni.  Both were excellent. The pizza's are thin crust and well done. If you like your pizza …More

name: Chad Dolan
text: Pizza were lacking any flavor and it took 90 minutes to receive my order

name: Lauren Bracken
text: Great service, great pizza! The pizza and wings were amazing and the service was just as good! My server, Brianna, was one of the best servers I’ve ever had! I will be asking for her every time. I wish I could rate this restaurant 10 stars!

name: Tisbe Avila
text: Very small restaurant, the staff members, bar and servers are super friendly. The kitchen is open, so you will see how everything is cooking. The only problem is that, is kinda hidden from the route 9. I'll definitely recommend it.

name: Paul White
text: Ordered drinks, wings and pizza at the bar.  $6 cheese pizza was great.  Drinks nice.  The wings not so much. Ordered 15 wings but I guess I has to pay full for ten and got a discount on the five - whatever.   The ten wings were great but the five were undercooked... as in red.   Bartender did not seem to care.

name: S Bobby Gerjarusak
text: Hi I rarely gave below a 4, and I hope to revisit again to reevaluate. We usually check before we go to a new place so we don't usually go to a place below a 4. Unfortunately our order was 10 min late (not big deal) and the pizza was badly …More

name: Everett Harman
text: I must say first that we didn't try the pizza, and that's the signature dish of Anthony's. We went there for a school fundraiser and had eaten enough pizza in the days before, so we had chicken parmesan and an order of meatballs. The …More

name: Suraj Shah
text: Really loved the pizzas here. Toppings were well cooked and the crust was well done and crispy.

name: Jonathan Ralon
text: Amazing customer service by Brianna very kind and professional and as well knowledgeable. I’m very decisive and she suggested the right things for me and it was amazing. Would most definitely recommend this restaurant

name: Syed Masroor
text: Really good pizza! Friendly service!!

name: Doc Massie
text: Absolutely perfect service. Paula, our waitress was fun and high energy and knew her way around the menu. The drinks were excellent and the food was GREAT!

name: Edwin Luff
text: I had read where other reviewers had trouble with getting their food from the kitchen and we're gifted chicken wings as an apology.  I figured that it was 'start-up' issues.   I had been here when they first opened and had a solar …More

name: Diego Rodriguez
text: Our server Cassidy was awesome. She had so many good suggestions for us when asking any question about the dishes on the menu and even gave us sample wings without asking which we then ordered along with 2 pizzas as well. The place is nice, drinks where great and food even better.

name: Christopher Amrich
text: The best pizza and wings. Excellent staff, and great manager! A+ experience!

name: Mark R
text: This place is a must! The wife and I love it here. Very clean, and the staff is always hustling. You can really tell they care. The Square Pie my personal favorite as well as their meatballs. Nice outdoor seating which is exactly what this area needs!

name: J G
text: Meh, expected more from a coal fired oven. Crust was doughy and heavy, not crunchy. Got mushrooms and onions, mushrooms were canned and onions were sauteed and soft. Also not a great value. The Italian spicy wings were really tasty, flavorful and not too hot, added a star for those.

name: John Connolly
text: Anthony’s Coal Fired Pizza in Natick is outstanding. Great value for this food. Not only can you get high quality pizza (coal fired), the wings, sandwiches, pasta and rest of the menu is outstanding. I have been multiple times, and eat at …More

name: Amy B
text: This place was amazing. Great food and great staff. Can't wait to go back again!! By the way best meatballs I've ever had out to eat. Just like moms!!

name: Michael Lyons
text:
This review is long overdue.
This restaurant is excellent.  My family and I eat here every weekend.  Whether we dine-in or take out to enjoy at home, consistently this establishment serves …More

name: Brittany T
text: Wow - I’ve been hoping a nice pizza place like this would pop up in our area! I was thinking they might need a few weeks to get up and running smoothly but we have been twice now and had great food, service and drinks both times. Can’t wait …More

name: Kait Shea
text: Sat at the bar and had the meatball and ricotta pizza and the eggplant. Both were delicious! Mo was very friendly and attentive. We will be back.

name: Loren Berry
text: I absolutely love this place. The staff is amazing and is always in a good mood. The two times that I have came here, in the same week (did I mention I love this place) I had the same waitress her name was Cassidie. She was so nice the very …More

name: Nancy Le
text: The bartender named Mo was amazing! She was friendly, attentive and made sure everything I ordered was exactly what i wanted. She was exceptional.

name: Joe Costa
text: The dry rub wings keep me coming back and the service is great.  Paula is am amazing bartender and makes all patrons feel right at home and welcome!

name: beth menard
text: The staff at this location is so amazing!! They're eager to do their job and smile while they do it. Even the hostess, Ava, was super kind and helpful when she brought us to our table.

name: Keven Osborn
text: While this is part of a large chain, this location really stands out.  The food is well executed and delicious. The main difference i noticed here was the staff. Everyone was on the ball, appeared happy to serve and supported each other. I …More

name: Thomas Sullivan
text: Awesome place. Great service, great food, great drinks in a clean and comfortable atmosphere

name: Stephen G
text:
Let's be honest; this is not your parents pizza place of old. A thoroughly modern and clean look, this IS the place to buy pizza
The wood fired oven is right there in front of you when you walk in. The …More

name: Lori Aidala
text: Ava was amazing as a host and take out person!   We live this restaurant and come here frequently.  It’s the best!!

name: John Toby
text: Great pizza and fair price.

name: Gary Grosso
text:
We went to Anthony's in Natick after being long-term customers in another location. So happy they opened up there.
Our waitress was exceptionally good, friendly and the staff very welcoming. …More

name: Ericka Dominguez
text: Love this place It has great food every time my daughter and i go our server Cassidie already knows our order. My daughter loves coming here and being able to play with pizza dough and being able to watch the cooks make the pizzas...

name: Nancy Laconte
text: Always great service....best meatballs and a cute pot to take home👍

name: Julian Walters
text: Awesome food and an even better staff! I highly recommend Anthony’s in Natick.

name: M F
text: Pizza trumps anything around, staff works on a constant round robin system it seems (running food, cleaning tables, greeting guests, etc.) and it works really well. People next to me were complaining that the service was excessive, I could …More

name: Christopher Cote
text: I would rate the pizza a 7.5 out of 10. The crust can tend to have a char in some places near the edges. This isn't too big of a deal. We ordered, Kid's pasta, cheese pizza, egg plant pizza, and Mediterranean pizza. I do feel all pizzas had …More

name: JCAGaming
text: Ordered 2 pizzas to go.  One of them was unfortunately very overcooked.  For the price we weren’t impressed.  Called but was told that coal fired is supposed to be that way.  Disappointed

name: Mark Roberts
text: Delicious food excellent service, but a little pricey

name: Anthony Schleppi
text: Brianna was pretty dope. Get this chick a raise. Pizza was pretty good too

name: James Murphy
text: Terrific quality along with service! You must try.

name: Sara Burke
text: I love coming here because Paula is awesome! Also, the meatball sandwich is the best thing on the menu

name: Danny Lafrance
text:
Great food and drinks.

But what's up with the deafening music blasting 2 notches above frat party …More

name: Jon Korzeniowski
text: The wings are so good!! Ava is very fun to talk to and does her job well.

name: Anita Adele
text: I was really excited for this place to open! The actual building is nice. I love the oven and bright signs. But the wait was way too long (for a pick up order) and it's kinda not worth the price. Not bad..not as good as expected.

name: Michael Rivera
text: Been to this place a few times and never left unsatisfied, the food there is always fresh, the staff are friendly; Specially Cassidie, she always goes above and beyond to make sure my family was satisfied. I’ll definitely be bacc here and asking for Cassidie when I do

name: Giovanni Miraglia
text: Overpriced fast-food level pizza.

name: Angel Carmona
text: Awsome!! Food/Good Environment/Servers are always on top of their game/ My Bartender was amazing She kept them coming and always aware my emptiness lol Cassidie she had me not waiting and always made sure i was not missing anything during my dinner She's Awsome!!

name: Addie Dominguez
text: Great place for some good pizza in natick. We got chicken wings, and a carnivori pizza that our server Cassidie suggested and it was the best choice we could have made. Left full and content with the food and the service. Definitely will be coming back soon and reccomend to others.

name: Nick DeRoo
text: A 25 dollar margarita pizza that is very underwhelming. Crust is good but not enough cheese, not enough sauce and this is all the basil we got on the side, wilted not fresh.

name: Richard Aidala
text: Ava is the best take out host ever!   Be sure tip generously!

name: Jerry Mailly
text: Stopped here for lunch had pizza and wings. Both were great. Service was fast.

name: Michael Hopkins
text: If I could give it zero stars I would. Awful experience for their soft opening. Drove all the way from West Warwick RI and was treated like trash. Went to order food and the waitress kept forcing us to try and combine the order. Instead of …More

name: Toby Metcalf
text: Tasty - try the cauliflower pizza - wings are ok

name: Robert Chmielinski
text: Clean, great service, very tasty pizza and salads. Good draft beer and IPA

name: spw Jones
text: Great food.  Love the service and Anthony's history.  Only issue was extra loud music which needs to be at a lower volume so you can have a conversation, and enjoy the food. Natick MA location.

name: Jerry Shusterman
text: Just opened this week so wanted to try it out. Checked menu on line, no prices. Ordered a small (12") pizza with 3 toppings including sweet peppers.  Told price was around $13, asked how much for the toppings and told 3 were free! A little …More

name: Raina Jordan
text: something to know about natick (and new england in general) is that everything is more on the expensive side. yes, it costs a pretty decent amount but you will not be disappointed. the staff is always hustling around, and when it got very …More

name: John Moran
text: Four of us enjoyed  the calzone and pizza Saturday night, actually went to eat at Natick location after ordering and enjoying pizza Friday. But I  feel totally ripped off. We paid $30 for three red sangrias, there couldn't have been a 1/4 …More

name: Jay Lemay
text: Food and service were great

name: Jenna Jaynes
text: Great food and friendly staff! We will definitely be back!

name: Aadi Pendse
text: Nice new location. Felt sad after the Northborough location closed 😭. I had a pepperoni and kalamata olive pizza🍕. It was tasty like the Northborough one. I also tried the long pepper 🌶️ and kalamata olive pizza🍕. It was very spicy    but great. The pizza 🍕 also has a nice crunchy texture. Definitely will be returning.

name: Valerie W
text: Pizza and more! All good. Full bar and outdoor setting what's not to like.

name: Frank Horn
text: Very good pizza, salad, sandwiches,  and friendly service!

name: uday
text: The Fresh Mozzarella Sliced Tomato & Basil 12” pizza I ordered online was amazing! But I went in the other day and ordered a 16” Traditional pizza and it was just OK.

name: Brian
text: Was good...not great but good

name: Jennifer Brock
text: Great addition to Natick! We dined in and split a large pizza two different ways. We really liked the thin crust, drinks were good, and the prices were reasonable. Very cool they also have a cauliflower pizza and the calorie counts are …More

name: Em S
text: Great pizza!  Loved the set up and outdoor dining area

name: Sarah Ramírez Bruno
text: Very good food I liked too much

name: Kenneth Webster
text: The staff was knowledgeable and friendly and the food was delicious

name: Irv Pimentel
text: Great food and better service

name: Gaming Outfitters
text: Amazing! Best pizza around! We love it WELL DONE.

name: Randall F
text: This town needed a place just like this. Fast, fun, friendly, and really good food.

name: Joe Eliseo
text: Yery good pizza

name: Moving and Shaking
text: Eggplant Marino pizza ... no cheese? Just pizza dough, a gallon of sauce and a thin piece of soggy, fried eggplant for $19. I just don’t get it.

name: Corinne Peck
text: Great food and atmosphere

name: Thomas Topham
text: Philly cheesesteak pizza is the best pizza I have ever had

name: Cali Libbey
text: Just another less than average pizza place in Natick.The price is outrageous for the size of the pizza.

name: Adalia Borrelli
text: Amazing service, the staff is very polite and great wings

name: Nolan Suraci
text: Very nice place

name: Scott McIntire

name: Richard Fine
text: Very tasty pizza, a little on the expensive side.
